In my opinion PORTAL 2 is one of the best puzzle and story mode video games in my Steam library. The game contains puzzle levels, where you have to think if you want to solve them, interesting and crazy game's stories, cool characters and nice graphics. There are some crazy and funny jokes and moments in the game. Also there're two stories in the game - singleplayer (about Chell) and cooperative (about Atlas and P-body). The coolest thing is that there are different levels for the two stories, and in my opinion the levels in the cooperative story are more interesting than the other.  I don't think the game has drawbacks. The game's graphics are better than the first one and the both games are not expensive. So I recommend this game to puzzles' fans (and of course people, which like to use their brains) and to people who like video games where they play with your friend in co-op and use the power of teamwork. I hope you enjoy it!!

Excelente ahora clásico/hito de la historia y biblioteca de VALVE, 100% recomendado para jugadores casuales como empedernidos. No es necesario pasar la primera entrega para entrar de lleno en este segundo juego. Sin lugar a dudas además de la entretenida, cómica y muchas veces "calienta cerebros" jugabilidad, el hecho de encontrarse dentro del universo de Half-Life ya propone en una historia bastante simple, horas y horas de re-jugabilidad incluso con algún amigo!
Arguably the most iconic puzzle game among both singleplayer and multiplayer markets. The game is pretty short, yet rich in lore and clever dialogue. This game is definitely a must have!

If you're looking for a worth puzzle game, this is definitely it. The story is great but the puzzles you can find in the community workshop are definitely worth playing for. There are so many kinds of unique and challenging puzzles out there. Playing this in co-op is also an experience to be had too, so grab a friend who likes puzzles and start playing.

Крайне интересная игра, к которой хочется возвращаться снова и снова. Невообразимый сюжет, интересный геймплей, кайфовейшая музыка и много других заслуг. Особенно радует кооператив, где очень приятно играть и веселится.
Но меня не устраивает ограниченность креатора. Да, есть hammer, но мне им лень учится пользоваться.
